sentences.en: Comet also sired the champion foal out of Spinway Harvest.
sentences.cn: “彗星”还跟“斯平威·哈维斯特”生下了这匹冠军小马驹。

sentences.en: The orbit of this comet intersects the orbit of the Earth.
sentences.cn: 这颗彗星的轨道和地球的轨道相交。

sentences.en: We were not altogether sure that the comet would miss the Earth.
sentences.cn: 我们不太确定这颗彗星是否会错过地球。
